Articles.Content:
What is the most wacky, ridiculous situation you have ever put/gotten your Kerbals in? Accidentally EVA'd during a Joolian Aerobrake? Fallen off of a ladder and exploded? Share your stories here!

Here's my Kerbal, who spontaneously broke while EVA close to Kerbol.

I'm going to refer you to this thread, which is still active: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/61781-What-is-the-most-unexpected-thing-that-has-happened-to-you

Thread closed
